statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_name, level FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 10;
SELECT player_name, achievements ->> 'completed' FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements @> '{"completed": true}';
SELECT player_id, player_name, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE experience BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT player_name, level FROM player_profiles WHERE level = 5 OR level = 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name ILIKE 'D%';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE level < 10 ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM player_profiles;
SELECT AVG(level) FROM player_profiles;
SELECT MAX(experience) FROM player_profiles;
SELECT MIN(experience) FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_id, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(achievements) AS num_achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(achievements) > 3;
SELECT player_id, player_name, achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements ? 'achievement1';
SELECT player_id, player_name, achievements -> 'detail' AS achievement_detail FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements ? 'achievement1';
SELECT player_id, player_name, JSONB_EACH_TEXT(achievements) AS achievement_pair FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements @> '{"achievement1": "completed"}';
SELECT player_id, player_name, level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name LIKE '%son%' AND level > 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name, experience, achievements -> 'level_completed' AS completed_levels FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT player_id, player_name, achievements -> 'rank' AS player_rank FROM player_profiles WHERE player_rank IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_id, player_name, achievements -> 'status' AS player_status FROM player_profiles WHERE player_status = 'active';
SELECT player_id, player_name, level FROM player_profiles WHERE level % 2 = 0;
SELECT player_id, player_name, achievements -> 'points' AS total_points FROM player_profiles WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 5;
SELECT player_name, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements ->> 'completed' = 'true';
SELECT player_name, achievements -> 'total' AS total_achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements -> 'completed' = true;
SELECT player_name, SUM(experience) AS total_experience FROM player_profiles GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, level, achievements ->> 'highest_level' AS highest_level FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 10;
SELECT player_name, level, achievements ->> 'rare_achievements' AS rare_achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements -> 'rare' = true;
SELECT player_name, level, achievements ->> 'common_achievements' AS common_achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements -> 'common' = true;
SELECT player_name, level, COUNT(achievements -> 'completed') AS total_completed_achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 5 GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, MAX(experience) AS highest_experience FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, AVG(experience) AS average_experience FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, level, achievements -> 'rare' AS rare_achievements_info FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements ->> 'rare_info' = 'detailed';
SELECT player_name, level, achievements ->> 'common' AS common_achievements_info FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements -> 'common_info' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_name, level, achievements -> 'rare' AS rare_achievements_info FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements ->> 'rare_info' LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT player_name, level, achievements ->> 'common' AS common_achievements_info FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements -> 'common_info' LIKE '%special%';
SELECT player_name, level, achievements ->> 'total' AS total_achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements ->> 'total' > 50;
SELECT player_name, level, achievements ->> 'completed' AS completed_achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE level BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT player_name, level, achievements -> 'rare' AS rare_achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE level <= 3 AND achievements -> 'rare' = true;
SELECT player_name, level, achievements -> 'common' AS common_achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 15 AND achievements -> 'common' = true;
SELECT player_name, level, achievements ->> 'rare_info' AS rare_achievements_info FROM player_profiles WHERE level < 8 AND achievements ->> 'rare_info' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_id, level_completed FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_id, player_name, level_completed, quests_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id;

SELECT player_profiles.player_name, player_progress.quests_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_profiles.player_level >= player_progress.level_completed;
SELECT player_id, level_completed FROM player_progress WHERE quests_completed >= 5;
SELECT player_name, level_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE quests_completed >= 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM player_profiles;
SELECT AVG(player_level) FROM player_profiles;
SELECT MAX(player_level) FROM player_profiles;
SELECT MIN(player_level) FROM player_profiles;
SELECT SUM(level_completed) FROM player_progress;

SELECT player_name, level_completed + quests_completed AS total_progress FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT player_id, level_completed, quests_completed FROM player_progress WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 5);
SELECT player_name, level_completed, quests_completed FROM player_progress JOIN player_profiles ON player_progress.player_id = player_profiles.player_id WHERE player_level <= 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = (SELECT player_id FROM player_progress WHERE level_completed = 10);
SELECT player_name, level_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id NOT IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_progress);
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 10
SELECT player_name, level_completed, quests_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE level_completed > 5
SELECT player_name, player_level, level_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT MAX(level_completed) AS max_level_completed, COUNT(quests_completed) AS total_quests_completed FROM player_progress
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name LIKE '%son%'
SELECT AVG(level_completed) AS avg_level_completed, MAX(quests_completed) AS max_quests_completed FROM player_progress
SELECT DISTINCT player_name FROM player_profiles
SELECT player_name, level_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE quests_completed < 10
SELECT player_name, level_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id ORDER BY level_completed DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT player_name, level_completed, quests_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_level > 5 AND level_completed < 10

SELECT player_name, level_completed, quests_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_name = 'Alice' AND quests_completed > 3
SELECT player_name, level_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING AVG(level_completed) > 7

SELECT player_name, MAX(level_completed) AS max_level_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING COUNT(quests_completed) > 5
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie')
SELECT player_name, level_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_name NOT LIKE '%er%'

SELECT player_name, level_completed, quests_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' OR player_name LIKE 'K%'

SELECT player_name, level_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_name = 'Alice' OR player_name = 'Bob' OR player_name = 'Charlie'
SELECT player_name, level_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_name = 'Alice' AND level_completed < 5
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name != 'Alice';

SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level, last_login FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT player_id, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, count(*) FROM player_profiles GROUP BY player_id, player_name;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level IS NULL;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level IS NOT NULL;
SELECT count(*) FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_id, progress_id FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_id, progress_data FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT game_id, total_players FROM game_statistics;
SELECT game_id, total_levels FROM game_statistics WHERE total_players > 1000;
SELECT game_id, total_players, total_levels FROM game_statistics WHERE total_levels > 50;
SELECT game_id, total_players, total_levels FROM game_statistics ORDER BY total_players DESC;
SELECT game_id, total_players, total_levels FROM game_statistics WHERE game_id < 1000;
SELECT game_id, total_players, total_levels FROM game_statistics WHERE game_id BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT game_id, total_players, total_levels FROM game_statistics WHERE game_id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 'abc123';
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, last_login FROM player_profiles WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 'def456' ORDER BY progress_id DESC;
SELECT progress_data->>'score' AS score FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 'ghi789';
SELECT player_name, progress_data FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_profiles.player_level >= 5;
SELECT player_name, total_players, total_levels FROM player_profiles JOIN game_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.game_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) AS total_players FROM player_progress;
SELECT AVG(total_levels) AS avg_levels FROM game_statistics;

SELECT player_name, COUNT(progress_id) AS total_progress FROM player_profiles LEFT JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING COUNT(progress_id) > 5;
SELECT player_id, total_players FROM player_profiles CROSS JOIN game_statistics;
SELECT player_id, player_name, progress_data FROM player_profiles LEFT JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE progress_data->>'score' > 100;
SELECT player_id, player_name, progress_data FROM player_profiles RIGHT JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE progress_data->>'level' = '5';
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_progress WHERE progress_data->>'level' > '3');

SELECT player_id, player_name, total_players, total_levels FROM player_profiles JOIN game_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.game_id WHERE total_players > 100 AND total_levels < 50;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT player_id, MAX(progress_id) AS latest_progress FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id;

SELECT player_id, player_name, total_players, total_levels FROM player_profiles JOIN game_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.game_id WHERE player_id NOT IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_progress);
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = ANY(SELECT player_id FROM player_progress WHERE progress_data->>'completed' = 'true');
SELECT player_id, player_name, progress_data->>'level' AS level FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE level = '10';

SELECT player_id, player_name, SUM(total_levels) AS total_game_levels FROM player_profiles JOIN game_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.game_id GROUP BY player_id HAVING SUM(total_levels) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM player_profiles GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, SUM(player_level) AS total_levels FROM player_profiles GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT * FROM progress_data;
SELECT level_number, score FROM progress_data WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_progress FROM progress_data GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM progress_data GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM inventory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM achievements;
SELECT achievement_name, description FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, MAX(achievement_id) AS latest_achievement_id FROM achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name FROM player_profiles JOIN achievements ON player_profiles.player_id = achievements.player_id;
SELECT player_name, item_name FROM player_profiles JOIN inventory ON player_profiles.player_id = inventory.player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 10
SELECT COUNT(player_id) FROM player_profiles
SELECT player_name, level_number, score FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN progress_data ON player_profiles.player_id = progress_data.player_id
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN inventory ON player_profiles.player_id = inventory.player_id
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, description FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN achievements ON player_profiles.player_id = achievements.player_id
SELECT player_name, player_level, achievement_name FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN achievements ON player_profiles.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE player_level > 5
SELECT player_name, player_level, item_name FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN inventory ON player_profiles.player_id = inventory.player_id WHERE quantity > 5

SELECT player_name, achievement_name, level_number FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN achievements ON player_profiles.player_id = achievements.player_id INNER JOIN progress_data ON player_profiles.player_id = progress_data.player_id

SELECT player_name, item_name, description FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN inventory ON player_profiles.player_id = inventory.player_id INNER JOIN achievements ON player_profiles.player_id = achievements.player_id

SELECT player_name, achievement_name, score FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN achievements ON player_profiles.player_id = achievements.player_id INNER JOIN progress_data ON player_profiles.player_id = progress_data.player_id
SELECT player_name, player_level, level_number, score FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN progress_data ON player_profiles.player_id = progress_data.player_id WHERE player_level > 5 AND score > 100
SELECT player_name, player_level, item_name, quantity FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN inventory ON player_profiles.player_id = inventory.player_id WHERE player_level > 10 AND quantity > 5
SELECT player_name, player_level, description FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN achievements ON player_profiles.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE player_level > 5
SELECT player_name, level_number, description FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN progress_data ON player_profiles.player_id = progress_data.player_id WHERE level_number > 10

SELECT player_name, item_name, score FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN inventory ON player_profiles.player_id = inventory.player_id INNER JOIN progress_data ON player_profiles.player_id = progress_data.player_id WHERE score > 100

SELECT player_name, player_level, description, quantity FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN inventory ON player_profiles.player_id = inventory.player_id INNER JOIN achievements ON player_profiles.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE quantity > 5
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, level FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 10;
SELECT player_id, treasure_collected FROM player_progress;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM game_settings;
SELECT id, username, level, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT id, setting_name FROM game_settings WHERE setting_name = 'sound';
SELECT username, level FROM player_profiles WHERE experience >= 1000;
SELECT id, level FROM player_progress WHERE treasure_collected > 5000;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE item_name = 'sword';
SELECT id, setting_value FROM game_settings WHERE id = 3;
SELECT username, level FROM player_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT player_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE date_achieved > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE setting_name = 'difficulty';
SELECT id, level FROM player_progress WHERE level BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%potion%';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 10 AND experience > 1000;
SELECT player_profiles.username, player_progress.level FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.id = player_progress.player_id;
SELECT player_profiles.username, player_inventory.item_name, player_inventory.quantity FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_inventory ON player_profiles.id = player_inventory.player_id;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_achievements.achievement_name, player_achievements.date_achieved FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_achievements ON player_profiles.id = player_achievements.player_id;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_progress.treasure_collected FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_progress.treasure_collected > 500;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_inventory.item_name, player_inventory.quantity, player_achievements.achievement_name, player_achievements.date_achieved FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_inventory ON player_profiles.id = player_inventory.player_id INNER JOIN player_achievements ON player_profiles.id = player_achievements.player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_progress.level, player_inventory.item_name, player_inventory.quantity FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.id = player_progress.player_id INNER JOIN player_inventory ON player_profiles.id = player_inventory.player_id;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_profiles.level, COUNT(player_achievements.id) AS achievement_count FROM player_profiles LEFT JOIN player_achievements ON player_profiles.id = player_achievements.player_id GROUP BY player_profiles.id;
SELECT player_progress.level, SUM(player_progress.treasure_collected) AS total_treasure FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_progress.level;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_inventory.item_name, SUM(player_inventory.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_inventory ON player_profiles.id = player_inventory.player_id GROUP BY player_profiles.username, player_inventory.item_name;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_inventory.item_name, SUM(player_inventory.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_inventory ON player_profiles.id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE player_inventory.quantity > 5 GROUP BY player_profiles.username, player_inventory.item_name;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_achievements.achievement_name, COUNT(DISTINCT player_achievements.date_achieved) AS unique_dates FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_achievements ON player_profiles.id = player_achievements.player_id GROUP BY player_profiles.username, player_achievements.achievement_name;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_progress.level, player_inventory.item_name, SUM(player_inventory.quantity) AS total_quantity, COUNT(player_achievements.id) AS achievement_count FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.id = player_progress.player_id INNER JOIN player_inventory ON player_profiles.id = player_inventory.player_id LEFT JOIN player_achievements ON player_profiles.id = player_achievements.player_id GROUP BY player_profiles.username, player_progress.level, player_inventory.item_name;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_achievements.achievement_name, player_achievements.date_achieved FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_achievements ON player_profiles.id = player_achievements.player_id WHERE DATE_DIFF(CURRENT_DATE, player_achievements.date_achieved) <= 7;
SELECT player_profiles.username, game_settings.setting_name, game_settings.setting_value FROM player_profiles CROSS JOIN game_settings;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_progress.level, player_inventory.item_name, player_inventory.quantity, player_achievements.achievement_name, player_achievements.date_achieved FROM player_profiles, player_progress, player_inventory, player_achievements WHERE player_profiles.id = player_progress.player_id AND player_profiles.id = player_inventory.player_id AND player_profiles.id = player_achievements.player_id;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_progress.level, player_progress.treasure_collected FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.id = player_progress.player_id UNION SELECT player_profiles.username, player_inventory.item_name, player_inventory.quantity FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_inventory ON player_profiles.id = player_inventory.player_id;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_achievements.achievement_name, player_achievements.date_achieved FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_achievements ON player_profiles.id = player_achievements.player_id ORDER BY player_achievements.date_achieved DESC;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_progress.level, player_progress.treasure_collected FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_progress.treasure_collected = (SELECT MAX(treasure_collected) FROM player_progress);
